structure.unit: Regulation Of Trade And Certain Enterprises

law.text: An action to enforce any liability created under sections fifty through sixty-four, inclusive, may be brought in any court of competent jurisdiction, within two years from the date on which the liability arises, except that where a defendant has materially and willfully misrepresented any information required to be disclosed to an individual and the information so misrepresented is material to the establishment of the defendantâ€™s liability to that individual the action may be brought at any time within two years after discovery by the individual of the misrepresentation.
